inn1.comm: and he begins with a wide outside offstump to give India their first runs
better shape on that one, a wobbler that hit the deck and swung away, Dravid leaves it

and he gets his man very early! The big wicket of Dravid! A beautiful delivery lands on off and moves the slightest bit, Dravid defends and the ball shaves the edge through to Carlton Baugh, a tame dismissal and West Indies have struck rich in just the first over, the ploy to begin with Smith's dobblers pays off
and he flays at the first ball he gets outside off stump, whoah, cowboy
good length on off and its defended into the covers
middle and leg line, worked off the pads but straight to the fielder at short square leg, a very tidy over that from Smith
and he begins with a wide like his counterpart in the previous over, except this one's way down the leg side
very bad, a real shocker way outside off stump, not collected cleanly either
better one, lands outside off and swings away, left alone
short outside off stump, Sehwag likes them there, stands tall and chops that down past gully for one to get off the mark
he's struggling here, this one pitches well outside leg and moves down, Baugh moves to his left and collects
good ball, fullish outside off and its left alone with a stride forward
a slower ball on a good length around middle and leg, he looks to tap it on the on side but doesn't time it well, calls of 'NO' back to Sehwag
driveable length on off, slow too, Sachin down on one knee and driving but he closes the bat's face too early and mistimes it to mid-off
good ball, lands on off and beats his forward prod

oh geez, he's struck twice! Wow! This pitches on a full length on off, moves in, Sehwag's feet go nowhere instead of forward, the ball just stays low and knocks back off stump, another tame dismissal but this was a man out of form, he has to go back and West Indies have knocked down two of India's big guns, well done Dwayne Smith!
leg stump and it's tucked around the corner for one
middle and leg, well controlled roll of the wrists and the ball fairly speeds away to the deep midwicket fence, first four
middle and off, tapped towards short midwicket, thought about the run but decides against it
fullish on off, well driven into the covers, call of 'WAIT' from genius to young gun
middle and leg, he hops and tries to turn to leg, not well-timed, another fine over from Smith, two from two!
holy, holy, what's he upto? A slow, driveable ball on off, he goes for a drive and the ball pops up over mid-off, so teasing that was, and runs away for four, close
good ball on off, shaves away past his bat
middle and off, defended to the onside
leg stump this time and he works if off the pads down to fine leg for one
fullish on off, he defends and gets the outer edge past a diving Chris Gayle at slip, ball was always dying on him and he cant get a hand on it, runs away for one
bad ball, wide down the leg side
full on the pads, a good pick-up flick off the pads, shouts of 'catch it' but its well in the gap between midwicket and square leg and away for four
this lands outside off, stays low, Sachin drives at it but is surprised by the lack of bounce and gets beaten
and this bounces about twice as much and he leaves it alone with a high raise of the arms
middle and leg, turned to Runako Morton at square leg who moves quickly and stops it
middle and off, defended back to the bowler
middle and leg, turned to square leg again, this time he calls for one and sprints down the pitch, Morton was quick but couldnt prevent the single
middle and leg again, tucks him up, turned straight to short midwicket
lands on middle and leg, very slow, Sachin stands and defends to the on side, he gets right behind this one
good length ball on off, gets a stride forward and defends with a dead bat
good ball, lands on off and nips in, flicks the pad as he goes to defend, basically played down the wrong line but no chance of an lbw as it was high and outside the line
good length on off, defended to the offside off the backfoot
this one's a fraction shorter outside off, he sees a scoring opportunity and goes to cut off the backfoot, but there was little footwork and he's beaten
fullish on off, he drives, gets an inside edge past leg stump and picks up one down to backward square leg
shorter on middle and leg, stands and turns it wide of midwicket and immediately wants two, he runs well and gets them
better ball, short of a good length on off, forced to defend off the backfoot
in the slot to drive outside off, he goes after it, not well timed and it flies in the gap at cover, fielder cant get to it in time and Sachin gets four more to his name
short of a length on off, he gets behind it and defends
good shot, fullish on off, gets into his stride and punches past mid-off, Wavell Hinds gives chase and pulls it in
fullish on and around off, driven with a flourish into the covers
moves past him from off stump and he shoulders arms
bad ball, very wide of the pads, Baugh collects
full outside off stump, he looks to square drive, ball loops over point and down to Hinds one the boundary ropes
good length outside off, he shoulder arms to this one
good ball outside off nips in a bit, Sachin defends and his hit on the knee roll outside the line
well bowled, full outside off and beats Sachin's forward drive
good length on off, defended to point off the backfoot, calls of 'NO' from Raina
another good ball on off, Raina hops back and defends, ball trickles into the covers, no chance of a single
good length on middle and off, Raina forward and defends with his head down, copybook defense from him
gone! A good ball, seam position worked, pitched outside off and Raina pokes at it, ball takes a thick outside edge and goes straight into Gayle's lap at slip, West Indies make further inroads
good ball on middle and off, Yuvraj solid in defense
just outside the line of off, Sachin goes forward and is rapped on the front pad, bowler appeals, there were two noises on that one, bat maybe, umpire shakes his head
outside off, good seam movement again, and its left alone, there's some juice in this pitch
good ball on off again, left alone once more
wow, this one lands outside off and nips in a fair deal, Sachin leaves it and the ball comes quite close to the top of off stump
good ball again, lands it on the seam and its defended off the backfoot
drifts onto middle and leg, Sachin back and works it to square leg but no chance of a run, back-to-back maidens here
full on off, he drives and gets an inside egde to short midwicket
good ball on off, Yuvraj back and defends it back to Smith

a huge nick and its four to Smith! A good-length ball on off, stands up a bit and surprises Yuvraj whose feet go nowhere, tries to get the bottom hand of the bat but the ball nicks the outer edge and goes through to a gleeful Baugh, another one bites the dust and India in serious trouble here
middle and leg and its easily tucked to square leg for one, Dhoni off the mark immediately
leg stump line, turned to that man Morton at square leg who stops with a good dive to his right
lands outside off and swing away, Sachin leaves with a raise of the shoulders and another successful Smith over comes to an end, he's been a revelation here
bad ball, way down the legside
good ball, fullish outside off, seams in as Dhoni leaves it alone off the front foot
half-volley on the legs, he gets forward and flicks through midwicket for four, first runs for him, a good hit too
a cracker from him again, short of a good length outside off, he gets forward and thwacks that past a diving point who gets a hand to it but the ball still rolls into the ropes
middle and leg, he hops and turns to leg but Sachin doesn't want the run
sweet! On middle and leg and its well flicked past square leg for four more, 50 up for India
middle and leg line, defended to the onside
nice shot, middle and leg, pushed past mid-on for a couple
good length on off, defended to point off the backfoot
fuller on off and its defended back to the bowler
very tight line, good length on middle and off, Sachin back in his compact defense
this one lands in the identical spot but has some lift on it, catches Sachin by surprise but he defends it well
full and wide of the pads again, not needed by West Indies at this stage
shorter on middle and leg and stays very low, he does very well to get bat on it and work it to square leg
wide again down the leg side, Baugh does well to collect going to his left, he's been given an exercise this morning
shot of the morning! Overpitched outside off, Sachin picks up the length quickly and unleashes a good flowing coverdrive past the two fielders for four
better ball, not as full, Sachin back in his defense
good length outside off, left alone with a raise of the shoulders
drifts onto middle and leg, he goes back and across and is hit on the back leg, ball was moving down the pads
fullish outside off and he leaves it alone for the 'keeper
good ball, lands on a good length on middle and off, watchfully tapped to short midwicket
good ball on off, little swing, Dhoni pushes that to Lara in the covers
shorter on middle and off, tucked to Chanderpaul at short midwicket, they set off for a run, Dhoni goes to ground his bat but jams it in and loses it
outside off and he cleverly nudges that past gully and down to third man
shorter outside off and he goes for some sort of chop, mistimed and the ball drops near the offstump
short and wide again and its cut down to third man
fuller outside off, chopped to point
Dhoni welcomes the third Powerplay with a thrash through covers. It was a long-hop, well outside the off and Dhoni helps himself

The three-fingered celebratory salute is on show! Collymore takes out Dhoni. Full, straight and Dhoni throws his bat at it. But the ball evades the flashing blade and crashes into the stumps. To say that India is in some trouble would be a understatement.
sails past the off stump, left alone
short of length, just outside the off stump, Agarkar goes back but not across, stays beside the line of the ball, punches it towards cover
slightly slower this time, on the off and middle stump line, patted back down the track
fullish, on the legs, Agarkar attempts to glance it, misses and the ball brushes the pad enroute to Baugh, the wicketkeeper
kicks up from a length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar hops across, adjusts to the extra bounce and gets it down..
back of length delivery, outside the off stump, pushed to cover point
beauty! it landed on the seam, on a length, just outside the off stump line and moved away sharply, Tendulkar is about to push at it, sees the movement and withdraws his bat.
on the hips, turned past square-leg
fullish, just outside the off stump, Agarkar hangs back at his crease, forces it past cover point
another tight over comes to an end. Length delivery on the off stump, Tendulkar moves back and defends it.
huge shout for lbw goes up. landed on a length, on the middle and leg stump line, moved in, Agarkar was caught at his crease, and the ball thudded into his pads. Would have hit the leg stump.
turned to midwicket
drifts down the leg side
fullish, outside the off stump but again Agarkar is caught at his crease, makes a late decision to come forward to drive but doesn't get much power behind it.

slightly back of length, outside the off stump, Agarkar is happy with such a length, he can hang back and cut it past point. But there is almost a run-out. Agark wants a second run, Tendulkar doesn't and Agarkar makes back in time.
pushed back down the track
on the leg and middle stump line, Tendulkar gets inside the line, turns it behind square-leg to retain the strike
defended to the off side.
on the hips, Tendulkar hops inside the line, works it past square-leg
And.... a bouncer!  Agarkar ducks into it
slightly back of length, just outside the off stump, Agarkar hangs back at his crease and cuts it to point.
on the middle and leg stump, hops back to work it past midwicket
That's end of a very good spell from Smith. Fullish on the off and middle, Tendulkar presses forward, head over the ball and defends it back down the track
fullish, Agarkar still prefers to stay back in the crease, drives, gets an inside edge, out to long-leg
length-delivery outside the off stump, Tendulkar gets back and across, punches it out to cover
well outside the off stump, on a length, Tendulkar reaches out for it, makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat and it runs down to third-man region
Defended off the back foot

What an orgasmic slower ball! It was delivered between his thumb and forefinger and it loops up, Agarkar is almost in a trance as the ball dips right in front of the middle stump and goes on to kiss it. Bravo runs with his arms extended for his celebratory run. Why not, that one must have given him real pleasure.
hits the deck around a length, on the stumps, pushed to the on side
on the stumps, keeps a touch low, Tendulkar goes back and turns it to the on side
on a driveable length, well outside the off stump, Tendulkar reaches out for it and drives it to extra cover
fullish, outside the off stump, driven to extra cover

That one zooted through. It was a fullish delivery outside the off stump, Tendulkar brings his bat down behind the line to make contact but the ball shoots along the ground, and squeezes below the bat..
comes forward and defends it back down the track
on the middle and leg stump line, full in length, Harbhajan pushes at it and the ball rolls over to the on side
sails past the off stump, left alone
bit of width outside the off stump, Tendulkar square-drives on the up, and the ball runs down to the third-man region
hits the deck back of a length and it pops up on the middle and off stump line, Harbhajan stands up tall, gets his wrists it working to keep the ball down
hurled well outside the off stump, fullish, inviting a greedy drive, but Harbhajan resists.
slower ball is out, but Harbhajan spots it and crashes the delivery,which was outside the off stump, past cover
in the channel outside the off stump, left alone
width outside the off stump, swatted away to widish third-man
If it wasn't a no-ball, it would have been wide. Drifted down the leg side
half-volley outside the off stump, Harbhajan leans into his cover drive and he would get couple of runs
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
again works a delivery on the stump towards midwicket
well outside the off stump, on a length, swatted away to sweeper cover
full and outside the off stump, left alone
driven to cover
wide outside the off stump...
comes back with a beauty. It was just short of driveable length, on the off stump line and moved away, Tendulkar ended up pushing inside the line and is beaten
length-delivery on the off stump, Tendulkar goes back and punches it to left of mid-off
pushed through outside the off stump, left alone
length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Harbhajan shuffles across, pushes it towards mid-on
overpitched outside the off stump, Harbhajan drives but mistimes it and the ball rolls to cover
outside the off stump, stops on him, Tendulkar forces it to sweeper cover
lands well outside the off stump and moves away, left alone
length delivery outside the off stump, Harbhajan lunges forward and has a stab at it, gets an inside edge to square-leg
on the middle and leg, worked to long-leg
Where did that come from? It was in the slot, just outside the off stump, Harbhajan leant forward and suddenly, decided to go through the line and waved it over the bowler's head
retains the strike with a single to deep cover
fullish on the off and middle stump line, pushed towards cover
snorter... banged in short and it climbs rapidly and Harbhajan shapes to hook, is surprised by the pace and the lift, shuts his eye, ducks and the ball brushes the helmet enroute to the wicketkeeper
fullish, on the off stump line, Harbhajan goes for a drive but too much bottom-hand meant the bat-handle turned and the ball rolled towards midwicket
gets behind the line to a fullish delivery on the off stump and pushes it towards cover
That slower ball again, dips late and rapidly on the middle stump line, Harbhajan gets his bat down in time, gets an inside edge that takes the ball past square-leg
legnth-dleivery on the middle and off stump line, Harbhajan shuffles across, tickles it behind square-leg and they run hard to take two
this one is on the leg and middle, Harbhajan flicks it away past square-leg and earns a comfortable two
thwack! Right up there in the slot for a drive, Harbhajan gets under the ball, and lofts it ,courtesy that bottom-hand, over long-on. Super shot!
on the middle and leg, flicked away
fullish just outside the off stump, Tendulkar attempts an offdrive, gets an inside edge which takes the ball to the right of mid-on
overpitched outside the off stump, driven to cover
length delivery on the middle stump line, Tendulkar goes back, lets the ball come to him, turns it to long-leg
fullish on the legs, flicked away for a single.
beaten outside the off stump as Tendulkar tries to run a length-delivery outside the off stump down to third-man
on the legs, attempts a flick, misses and the ball runs off the pads
just down the leg side, not called a wide, though. It was pretty close to the leg stump...
on the legs again, worked past square-leg
defended watchfully off the front foot
pushed to extra cover and they cross over for a single
length-delivery on the stumps, defended off the front foot
back of length, on the off stump, Tendulkar works it to the on side
length-delivery outside the off stump, Tendulkar forces it off the back foot, past cover
on the off stump line, fullish, driven down the ground to long-on
floated outside the off stump, Harbhajan stays back, cuts it to backward point
tossed up full, just outside the off stump, turning in, Tendulkar works it to long-leg
turns in from outside the off stump, Harbhajan goes back to dead-bat it away to the off side
again goes back to defend
fullish outside the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
wide down the leg side and short in length as well, Harbhajan tries to pull but misses
Fifty up for Tendulkar! works a fullish delivery on the stumps, past square-leg and reaches his 73rd fifty
comes down the track and works it to deep midwicket
turns in from outside the off stump, defended off the front foot
gets an outside edge while trying to defend and the ball runs past short third-man
pushed to the on side
spun across Harbhajan.
turned to deep midwicket
worked to short fine-leg
tossed on the stump, turned to midwicket
lands on a length, outside the off stump, grips the surface and bounces. Harbhajan adjusts and uses his wrist to keep it down
paddle-sweep is out. Predetermined shot of course but he most often gets it right.
pushed to cover
goes back and turns it to midwicket
again works it to the on side
attempts to pull, doesn't time it well and the ball rolls to midwicket
defended to the on side.
tossed up outside off, Sachin back and across and defends it
tossed up, middle and leg, and he takes the aerial route with a slog over midwicket for four, good aggressive shot
paddled from off around the corner, the overthrow allows them a second run
pressure shows now, this is flicked from leg stump down to backward square leg, the fielder makes a mess as he dives over it and allows a boundary
middle and leg, turned fine for a single
fullish on off stump, defended towards point, good over for India
full on middle and leg, worked to short midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, an aggressive swipe across the line and the ball speeds through midwicket
full on middle and off, defended to mid-on

wicket! Lands on a short length outside off, perhaps a little too close for that shot, he went for a square cut and got the thinnest of edges which Baugh did supremely well to snap, Harbhajan doesnt wait for the umpire's verdict and walks, his resistance ends and India are now seven down, Gayle gets a wicket to his name
dropped in short around off, Sachin leans back and dabs that off the face of the bat right in front of Baugh for one to third man
short and movin down leg, turned right to backward square leg
good length on off, punched to covers off the backfoot

and it's another wicket in unfortunate circumstances! Tossed up on on off, RP drives back down the ground to Samuels' left, he reaches for it and gets a finger to it, ball ricochets off his hand and onto the nonstriker's stumps, Sachin is out of his ground, the decision goes upstairs, Asad Rauf takes little time in flashing the red light and an unfortunate end to a solid innings, India slip towards the end of it all
middle and leg, defende to the onside
tossed up on off, defended
off stump again, pushed to covers off the back foot
middle and leg, well turned around the corner
short and wide, cut to the man at gully
tossed up, goes well forward in his defense
middle and off again, defends, ball rolls to the onside, Samuels comes around and does the collecting himself

bowled 'em! Beaten for pace, he goes back when he shouldnt have, played the wrong trajectory, basically, and the ball doesnt spin much and goes on low to knock back middle stump, an easy wicket for Gayle, who has two now, and West Indies carry on their success over this hapless Indian side here
full on off, defended back to Gayle

run out, and it's all over, thankfully! Tossed up, defends, gets an edge past the diving slip, ball runs down to third man, they sprint through for an easy two but suddenly lose their marbles and chance the fielder's arm for a third, a good throw comes in from Samuels and Sreesanth is caught well short of his ground, madness that was, and India's pathetic innings comes to an end

inn2.comm: middle and leg, turned through square leg with ease
middle and off, defended
off stump, stands and glides that past gully for a single
full and swinging away outside off, left alone
a good length on off, makes him come forward and defend to covers
leg stump line, tucked around the corner for one
good ball on off, defended and the ball rolls to the onside
good ball outside off, left alone with a stride forward
another good ball outside the off stump is left alone
closer and fuller to the off stump, defended into the covers
drifts down leg, does too much, raps the pads and slips down to square leg, Munaf's muted appeal is ignored
moved away a lot from outside off, not called wide eh?
full on off, driven hard back to the bowler who does well to stop it
swinging away outside off too wide and its duly called so this time around
tucks this onto middle and leg and its worked with ease towards square leg for a single
good ball, sir, pitches on off and seams past Chanderpaul's forward lunge
land on leg stump and holds its line, close to leg and not called wide
full outside off and its ignored
short outside off, he stands and wafts the bat at it and makes zero contact
and again its wide and he flays at it once more, no contact
fullish outside off, beats the bat
full on off, driven through covers
full again outside off, in the zone, please hit me, he eases into his drive and the ball speeds away to the fence, its as simple as that
good length, probing outside off, defended past point for a single
close appeal for lbw, this one pitches around off and Chanderpaul shoulders arms, the ball caresses that front pad and all go up in appeal, but that was outside the line
fuller on middle and off, played back to Agarkar
middle and leg, he goes to flick, ball clips the pads and beats Dhoni's dive
good ball, full on off and Morton is solid in defense
good ball, perfect length on off, defended off the backfoot to covers
begins with a rank half-volley that swings away wide of off stump
again, wide of off stump from over the wicket, Chanderpaul is in no hurry
better ball, straighter on off, poked at and gets an edge past gully for one
full into middle and leg, worked straight to short midwicket
full on off, driven past Sreesanth to Harbhajan at mid-off who moves across and stops
good ball, lands on a sweet spot on off, Morton hops into his defense
fullish outside off, Morton has a full-blooded swing at it and sends it swirling over point for four, fielder at third man cant get to it
full outside off stump and swinging away, left alone again
lands on off and swings away from Chanderpaul's forward prod
a good length ball on off, defended at and the ball sneaks between his legs and somehow misses hitting the leg stump, a close shave!
full outside off, inviting the drive, and he obliges with a firm push through the covers that speeds away to the fence, good stroke to end a good over
full on off, firmly struck past Sreesanth towards mid-off, they steal a single quickly
full on off, another half-volley the way batsmen like them, and it disappears past Harbhajan at mid-off for four, good shot
better ball, a good length on off that nips into him as he stands and defends
middle and leg line, worked to Sehwag at square leg, Sreesanth striving for the offcutter
pitches on the spot on off, Morton has to defend off the front foot
good length delivery on the stumps again, defended to the off side
good length on off again, and its defended to point, more bounce on that one
fullish on off, Morton defends, rapped on the pads, a loud shout from all but umpire Benson shakes his head, perhaps outside the line of offstump
lands on a sweet spot outside off and jags in sharply, nearly cuts him in half
tucks him up again with the movement in, somehow manages to get bat on that and steals one to wide of square leg
good length ball outside off stump, pushed to point off the back foot
a more driveable length outside off, but he mis-times it to covers
middle and leg line, eased to square leg for one
a quicker one lands on off and moves in sharply, stands tall and works it in front of midwicket for a quick single
a low full toss outside off is tamely driven back towards the bowler
good ball, he is lulled into the drive outside off but ends up poking at it, beaten by some distance
good length ball on off, goes forward and defends back to the bowler
short outside off, cracked off the back foot, Raina at cover dives to his left and stops it

full in the zone on off, Morton has a full-blooded swing at it, was caught up by the slowness of the ball, slams it over mid-off and the ball slows down in front of the ropes, they get two for it in the end
middle and leg and quicker, tucks into him, he works it midwicket for one anyways
good, straight ball on the stumps, no movement, and Chanderpaul pushes that back to Munaf
shorter on off, moves away, Chanderpaul tries some sort of crab-like hoik to that but the ball takes the edge and bounces in front of Dhoni
this one pitches on off, swings in sharply, Morton is caught on the crease and rapped but very high, feet were off the ground but a loud appeal is turned down due to the height on that one
similar ball but this time he's ready and goes for a pull, mis-timed and the ball trickles to square leg
fuller on off and its defended to point off the front foot
short of a good length and quick outside off, he stands tall and defends to the on side
drifting into the pads, played at but the ball clips his front leg and they pinch a leg bye
good length on off, kept a tad low, Morton goes onto the back foot to drive but gets an inside edge to the on side, fielder swoops in, bowler moves in to collect as well

first wicket goes! A very soft dismissal, banged in short, Chanderpaul moves into position to pull, ball hurries on him, his head goes one way, eyes the other, and all he can end up doing is cramping himself into a loose shot that spoons up in the air and Sehwag moves in from square leg to take a dolly, Munaf gets a vital breakthrough, Chanderpaul goes, and India must capitalise on this
full outside off stump and left alone
full and swinging away outside off again, left alone with a stride forward

full and fast around offstump, Sarwan forward, plays at it, rapped on the front pad, a loud shout from everyone in blue, but umpire Benson shakes his head, yes, that one did look like it was outside the line of offstump
quick on the stumps and its defended towards point
banged in short, goes for a pull, mis-timed it and it rolls to square leg
short outside off, stands tall and punches into the covers
fuller on the offstump, driven into the covers
pitched on the leg stump, clips the pad for a leg-bye
full on middle and off, defended
good length on off, stands tall and punches into the covers
another good length ball on off, defends off the front foot
quicker on middle and off, leans over and turns that in front of midwicket
this lands outside off and swings in very close to the stumps, Sarwan stands leaden-footed and goes for it with one hand, misses and Dhoni takes
shorter outside off, hops and punches it through covers

edged and taken! This lands on a sweet spot outside off stump, pitches and kicks a little, Sarwan is taken by the bounce as he looks to cut, the ball cramped him as well and he can only feather an edge through to Dhoni, Munaf strikes again
Outside the off stump, short in length, attempts to cut, gets an inside-edge...
pushed to Harbhajan at mid-on who misfields and they take a run
Fullish outside the off stump, and Morton cashed in on the width.
hit the deck around back of length, around the off stump line, punched back to mid-on

Bit of juggle in the slips and a team-effort to get the wicket. Morton flashes at one outside the off stump, the extra bounce produces the edge and the ball flies to left of Dravid who fails to take it cleanly, the ball bounds off his palms but Dhoni moves quickly to his right to take the catch.
length-delivery on the off stump line, Samuels stays where he is and dead-bats it away
fullish outside the off stump, drawing Hinds forward, and he pushes it quietly to the off side
another delivery just short of driveable length, outside the off stump , Hinds pushes at it , the bat hits the pad, the ball hits the bat but the edge falls short of the second slip
another one short of driveable length, angling across, Gayle thrusts his right foot out and pushes outside the line and the ball thuds into the pad
this time Gayle gets behind the line and pushes it to the off side
fullish on the middle stump, Hinds ends up driving around his front pad, which is thrusted too much across, and the ball rolls over towards mid-on
back of the length delivery, outside the off stum, steered to third-man
slanted across Hinds, who watches it carefully, and shoulders his arms
again pushed across and again Hinds lets it go through.
hits the deck on a length, around the off stump line, Hinds stands up tall, right elbow high, and offers the full-face of the bat in defense
Sreesanth appeals for a lbw decision. It was fullish in length, just outside the off stump and Hinds pushes at it, bat and pad close together, and ball brushes the pad before pinging the bat
in the channel around the off stump, full in length, Samuel leans forward, head over the ball and pushes it back down the track
bang! short and outside the off stump, Samuels accepts the invitation and slashes it past point

Gets his line and length right this time and is rewarded with a wicket. But Samuels also helped him to an extent with a nothing shot. It was a length-delivery, on the off stump and  came in a touch. Samuels stays back at the crease, his bat comes down in an angle and late at that and is caught right in front.
length-delivery on the leg and middle stump line, turned to square-leg
similar delivery and Gayle works it towards mid-on
slanted across the stumps, left alone
RP Singh starts off with a wide down the legside.
coming in, with the angle, from outside the off stump, pushed to mid-off
short of length, on the middle stump line, Hinds works it through the vacant midwicket region and they run hard for a couple of runs
length-delivery around the off stump, again just comes in with the angle, pushed to extra cover
lands outside the off stump, on a length, but this time it holds its line, Hinds spots it and doesn't offer a stroke
short of length delivery, comes in from outside the off stump, patted back down the track
again back of the length delivery, on the middle stump line, the angle allows Hinds to push it to the left of mid-off
short of length, outside the off stump, Hinds pushes at it, bat away from his body, and the ball rolls over to point
almost a catch. Didn't quite carry to Tendulkar at first slip. It was just short of driveable length, outside the off stump, Hinds is drawn forward, drives loosely and gets an outside edge.
hits the deck short of length, on the middle and leg stump line, turned to left of square-leg and they hurry through for a quick single
pushed across Gayle, who lets it go through to Dhoni
slanting across Gayle, skids after hitting the turf, Gayle opens the face of the bat to run it down to the third-man region
full outside the off stump, Gayle threw his bat at it, doesn't connect. Wide called.
landed on a length just outside the off stump, comes in with the angle, pushed to mid-off

Another one goes down. It landed on a length, just outside the off stump and comes in with the natural left-armer's angle. Gayle is caught at the crease, waves his bat across the line, doesn't connect and is plumb in front. Another nothing shot.
pushed across, left alone
Wow! Spanking pull, off his second ball, slightly short of length and Smith latches on to it.
Another boundary. This one was a full-length delivery, outside the off stump and Smith goes cleanly through the line, past cover

take that! Dwayne Smith continues to rock on. He has just walked in, played his first ball quietly and then has gone berserk. A fullish delivery, on the stumps - nothing wrong with that, but Smith swings it over midwicket
length-delivery on the off stump, turned close to the on side and for some reason Hinds thought there was a run it. Smith didn't and thats that.
speared in full on the off stump line, skids after pitching, Hinds gets forward to dead-bat it away to the off side.
slanted across Hinds, who pushes at it with an opened face of the bat, and ball runs down to the third-man region

Inside-edge onto the pads but given out lbw. Fullish delivery, on the off and middle stump line, coming in a touch and Smith pushes at it outside the line and gets an inside edge but not spotted by the umpire.
on the hips, Bravo hops back and turns it to square-leg
pushed across Bravo who thrusts his left pad across and before his bat can come around it, the ball thuds into the pad. But the point of impact was well outside the off stump
sailing outside the off stump, left alone
fullish delivery on the middle and leg stump line, pushed back down the track
short of length delivery, slanting across, left alone
hurled across full, on the legs, Bravo tries to flick, his head falls over in the process and he doesn't make contact. the ball bounds off the pads to the on side
His head is still this time and he succeeds in whipping a fullish delivery on the middle and leg stump past square-leg
full and on the middle stump line, Bravo whips it across the line, through the vacant midwicket region
slanted across Hinds, just outside the off stump and left alone
with a slight round-arm action, he skids another one across the left-hander. Hinds goes for a slash, misses.
outside the offstump and left alone
fullish on the off and middle stump line, pushed to mid-off
Agarkar keeps peppering the same line. another one slanting across, left alone
tossed up outside the off stump, Bravo leans forward to smother any turn
comes down the track and drives it to wide mid-on
beaten! flighted delivery lands on the middle and off stump line and spins across Hinds' defensive prod
defended off the front foot
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
another testing delivery, just outside the off stump and turning in. Bravo pushes at it and gets an inside edge on to his pads.
short of length, coming in from outside the off stump, Hinds stays where he is, pushes it towards extra cover
full-length delivery, coming in with the angle from outside the off stump, pushed towards mid-off
slides one across with a round-armish action, Hinds has a close look at it, and shoulders his arms
another one sliding just outside the off stump, slightly shorter than the previous delivery and Hinds attempts a cut, misses.
fullish, on the off and middle, Hinds is slightly late in pushing forward and gets an inside-edge which takes the ball to the on side
this time he is quick to press forward, head over the ball and dead-bats it away to the off side
outside the off stump, defended off the front foot
dropped! Bravo runs down the track and tries to play inside-out past mid-off but only gets it towards the left shoulder of Munaf Patel, at mid-off, who fails to hold on.

stumped! After getting nearly out, Bravo tries repeating another adventure down the track and is decieved by a doosra. His back feet is on the line, and instead of dragging his feet back to safety, he tries to turn and get his bat inside the crease and that gives enough time for Dhoni to whip off the bails.
on the leg and middle, tickled down the corner
on the off stump line, comes in with the angle from round the tracks and then turns away, but Hinds covers the line and dead-bats it away
Munaf Patel sends one in the channel outside the off stump and Lara lets it go through to Dhoni
another one pushed across, outside the off stump, Lara gets his right foot out, covers the stumps and shoulders arms
tempted Lara with a fuller one well outside the off stump and Lara obliges, goes for drive but doesn't connect
Lara gets it right this time. A fullish delivery, outside the offstump, and Lara off-drives it to the right of mid-off for a lovely boundary
on the leg and middle, turned to midwicket

just about gets his bat in time and makes contact. The ball appeared to be heading straight towards the front pad, which was thrusted a little too much across but Lara gets his bat around it in time and tickles it down to fine-leg
wide down the leg side.
spin and bounce. but it all happened outside the off stump and Lara lets it go through
full on the middle and off, Lara sweeps it past square-leg
lands on the leg and middle, turns in, Hinds defends it.
floated outside the off stump, deliberately padded away
lovely delivery and Hinds is beaten. It landed just outside the off stump, on a length and Hinds goes for a drive. The ball grips the surface and spins past the flashing blade.
georgeous drive past the bowler. It was in the slot, on the off stump line, and Lara drives it past the bowler , past the mid-off and into the long-off fence
driven to mid-on
pushed across Lara, a good-length delivery, and Lara shuffles across, covers his stumps and lets it go through to Dhoni
another testing delivery, on the off stump line, full in length, and moving away a touch. Lara gets across the line in an effort to get behind the line and pushes it back down the track
pushed to wide mid-on and they cross over for a single
in the corridor outside the off stump, Hinds watches it all the way into Dhoni's gloves

tossed outside the off stump, full in length, Lara initially shapes as if he is going to drive it, but just pushes at it with soft hands, his bottom-hand off the handle and the ball rolls past the slip
on the legs, Lara tries to flick, doesn't connect and the ball brushes the pads enroute to Dhoni, who appeals.
Lovely late-cut! It was not even that short, but just outside the off stump, Lara bends his back knee, waits for the ball to come and chops it past slip.

beaten in flight. It was tossed up on the stumps, Lara goes forward but is decieved by the the flight but just goes through with his shot and the ball goes in the air towards the mid-on area. But the man  is down at long-on and so no damage done to the West Indies scorecard
slightly back of length, coming in from just outside the off stump and Lara gets his bat around his front pad in time and turns it past square-leg
half-volley outside the off stump, well outside in fact, Hinds throws his bat at it, makes contact with bottom-half of his bat and runs it past point
length-delivery on the off stump line, punched towards mid-off
length delivery on the stumps, coming in with the angle, pushed back down the track
yorker! hurtles straight towards the off stump , Hinds gets his bat down just in time to keep it out
driven inside-out to deep-cover
on the leg and middle stump line, turning in , Hinds pushes at it, it goes off the pads
tossed up on the leg and middle stump line, Hinds pushes at it and is hit on the pads. Appeal goes up but maybe it didn't turn enough.
another desperate appeal for a catch this time, turned down. Hinds goes for a sweep, doesn't connect , the ball rolls over his arm and bounds off the shoulder to Dhoni.

And they were two. Well-flighted delivery, on the middle stump line, Hinds shapes to work it away across the line, gets an leading edge and Harbhajan takes an easy return catch. A long vigil from Hinds comes to an end.
pushed to the on side
full, on the off stump line, Lara leans forward, drives but can't go past the mid-off fielder
length-delivery outside the off stump, Lara thrusts his right foot across, covers the stumps, shoulders arms
full in length, just outside the off stump but Lara moves so much across the stumps that he ends up getting behind the line and offers a dead-bat
shuffled across and intially shaped to turn it to on side, then pushed at it , gets an outside edge , past slips to the third-man fence.
outside off, steered past point
tossed up on off, swept past square leg and down to Munaf at fine leg for a brace, that was well run
short and wide, spins sharply and Lara reaches across and slaps that past slip and gully, RP dives but cant get to it and its four
middle and leg, he moves across and turns it fine for two more
tossed up on off, Lara forward in tight defense
flatter outside off, pushed into the covers for a sharp single, Lara will retain strike
good length ball outside off, Lara back and defends into covers
another good ball on the stumps, a decent line this, Lara back and across and defends back to the bowler
good ball outside off again, some lift there as Lara hops in the crease and defends, ball rolls to point
this angles into leg and comes close to leg as Lara shuffles and looks to glance, just clips the thigh pad through to Dhoni
good ball on off, again he hops and defends into the offisde, point swoops in quickly but they're off in a flash for one
fullish outside off, some swing, left alone as he covers his off stump, regulation take for Dhoni behind the stumps
good offbreak, pitched outside off and spun away, Lara think about it and pulls the bat out of the way at the end
tossed up outside off, Lara didnt pick the length and has to adjust his shot, ball takes the edge and flies to Dravid's left at slip, close call there
this is more middle and leg and its easily tucked off the hips for one
tossed up outside off, Baugh just plants the foot forward and drives that in the air between point and covers for four
shorter in trajectory and spinning from middle down leg, wide signalled by Tony Hill
outside off, pushed to extra cover
once again tossed up outside off, driven hard to Tendulkar at mid-off who dives to his left and stops runs, 19 to get for West Indies
good ball, pitches on a driveable length outside off, Baugh stands and looks to dab it fine but misses
full outside off and its left alone with a stride forward and a raise of the shoulders
fuller in the slot on off stump, driven into the covers where Sehwag dives to his left and stops it, a good effort
a good length outside off again, Baugh stands and just dabs at it and makes no contact
fullish outside off again, Baugh shoulders arms and allows it to pass safely, thats a maiden from Agarkar
width offered outside off, rocks back and cuts that past point for one

he's gone! Tossed up outside off, its the arm ball, Baugh is leaden-footed as he has been for most of his innings, stands there and pokes at it, the ball kisses the edge and pops into Dravid's hands, he takes a good catch and West Indies are nine down, we have a cracker here
tossed up quicker on off stump, defended off the front foot
tossed up on middle and leg, goes to flick, just goes past Raina at short leg, Lara declines the single, end of a tight over
short outside off, goes to pull but makes bad contact, ball thuds into his boot
fuller this time outside off, Lara hustles and defends to point
again outside off, not enough room to cut and he dabs it fine, ball goes to slip on the bounce
good ball, lands outside off and swings away, Lara judges it and leaves it alone

good length ball on the stumps, Lara hops across and works it to the onside, Sreesanth makes great speed in moving to his left and collecting, he hurls the ball in, Baugh is not even in the frame but the throw misses the stumps, intense stuff here!

all over, thats it! A quick, good length delivery on middle and leg, Collymore is just rooted at the crease and gets hit in line, that one did keep slightly low,  looks likely to take leg stump, every Indian goes up in appeal and the umpire slowly raises his finger! Sreesanth gets the final wicket, India have won by 16 runs, they've done their shot at the finals no harm
